Hi Rainsberger,
Am using WSAD 5.0 and i have already installed my project on it. I 
dont know how to write test classes for my java files using WSAD. 
Which plug in or configurations i need to change to get enable my 
WSAD for writing Junit test classes.
regds,
Dipta keshari

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@r...> 
wrote:
> junit_user2004 wrote:
> 
> > Hi All,
> > 
> > Currently am using WSAD for developing my application and need 
your
> > help to set up JUnit using the IBM IDE called as WSAD.
> > can anyone help me in this regard.
> 
> Which version of WSAD?
> 
> As far as I know, there's nothing you need to do. What problems are 
you 
> having?
